text: In the event of a tie during the Reckoning, the power to decide the winner is left in the
hands of the Goat Keeper.
That's so f***** up!

Yeoman, remove the Goat Priest
and bring forth the urns.
The moment has finally arrived.
While Ben's epic journey took some unplanned twists and turns,
our script always had him landing in this exact position.
Forced to choose between winning $100,000 or giving it away to someone he deems worthier.
Ben.
Yes, Cat.
I do not envy you.
As the Goat Keeper

the decision is yours.
If you choose to smash Maya's urn
you will be the Goat, winning $100,000 and becoming the first winner of The Goat USA.
If you choose to smash your urn

Maya
- is the Goat.
Please make your decision.
They're. They're nervous. I'm nervous.
Oh, God. Why do we do this to ourselves?

Holy s***. I cannot believe I get to
make the final decision

and this is just the decision
of a freaking lifetime for me.
Maya, you did this to yourself.
You didn't have to save me
but you did. And now I'm here to crown the Goat, which only I,
Keeper of Goat, can do.
Oh!
This is a man. What a f****** man!
Yes!

Whoo! 
Oh my God! Oh!

It's like, what's cooler?
You know
winning $100,000 or giving it away?
I know she deserves the money.
It felt great in that moment.
Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa. Look look look. You found a token.
Holy guacamole.
Ben, you have found the final token.
Please read it aloud.
Congratulations, Ben Frisone.
You have found the Eyes of Elijah token.
When played at the Reckoning,

this token earns you the right to have 
your mind completely blown.
The game is now complete.
Hi, Ben.
Hello.
Holy s***.
Well, Maya may be the last player standing,
but, remember my words to you when we first met?

The key to winning the Goat was 
self-sacrifice.
Sacrificing yourself to someone you met ten days ago
is something I'm not sure anyone would have done.
She's not just anyone, though.
She's. She's a very special girl.
